## Overview
The city of Hopetopia, like all cities, contains a wide variety of associations, advocacy groups, and nonprofits who serve a variety of constituencies throughout the city. This page provides a brief round up of some of the major organizations in the city.

## Associations

### Restauranteurs Association
The Restauranteurs Association represents the interests of the restaunt industry in Hopetopia. They collect membership dues from member restaurants and, in exchange, provide help with a variety of common operations needs. Their membership includes about 85% of the restaurants in Hopetopia and maintains an operating budget of $10,000,000 per year. Generally, they focus on issues related to regulatory burdens and things that might affect labor costs.
